blog.name: shippingcast
blog.title: The Shipping (Pod)Cast
blog.description: a fortnightly multi-fandom podcast for the shipper in you, hosted by @shirasade. creating a chain of interviews with fans talking about their otps and why they love them. subscribe and listen now!

title: Vicious, by feelslikefire
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Midoriya and Bakugou wind up in the very last position either of them thought they’d be in: Hero Partners. It’s not fun, but they learn to cope. Their first big assignment together takes them undercover to infiltrate a cult, but the situation turns out far more sinister than they first thought.

(Or: Midoriya and Bakugou pretend to be Fake Married, join a cult, start having sex, and learn not to suck as partners, not necessarily in that order.)

As mentioned on episode 6 of @shippingcast.

blog.name: coldwind-shiningstars
blog.title: the mushroom is the elf of plants
blog.description: Novy, they/them or it/its, small and confused | Possibly a star person, possibly a vole, most definitely a cryptid | Hire Me to Do Science! I'm Queer And Disabled! | On my twentieth birthday I was told that sometimes talking to me is like reading Homestuck and I'll probably never get over it. Does A Sheep Have A Backbone? In Fact It Has No Bones At All! Avatar by Ghost @ghost-of-creatures-past!

question: 001 | MomoJirou
answer:
1. When I started shipping it: Um, no particular time? Maybe when I realized other people were shipping them. In canon, possibly the time Jirou crashes the studying party despite being solidly ranked in the middle of the class when the people Momo originally offered to tutor were ranked last.

2. My thoughts: They’re just … really great characters, both of them, and I love them individually and together. Also, large prim Momo and her tiny punk gf is a VERY good genre of fanart. I mostly tend to ship them in a “Jirou is also dating Kaminari” way, or at least incorporate a Kamijirou aspect somehow? 

3. What makes me happy about them: Imagining Momo’s absolute glee at being taken to a punk band concert.

4. What makes me sad about them: Nothing in particular?

5. Things done in fanfic that annoy me: When someone tags the relationship and it’s one single sentence of one of them asking the other out, and then never brought up again. I guess that’s a fandom-wide thing? But Momojirou, while not a rarepair, definitely seems to appear in the background much more often than it’s the primary focus.

6. Things I look for in fanfic: Umm… *waves vaguely at the Momojirou fic I wrote* … that? Mostly “developing relationship, as few Stereotypes as possible.” I also really like trans Jirou. 

7. Who I’d be comfortable them ending up with: Jirou and Kaminari (+ Shinsou)?, as previously mentioned! Momo/Kendou kismesis is ALSO a ship I really enjoy/ would like to write sometime, where “kismesis” here means “a romance where they compete with each other and that competition makes them better people.”

8. My happily ever after for them: They’re both heroes. Momo gets a better costume. Jirou and the Chokers (the cultural festival band) still plays some gigs and Momo goes and cheers without really being part of The Scene. Momo gets a bra, and then a breast reduction, because breasts that large really can cause several health issues and she’s a professional athlete and needs to be able to move well. 

9. Who is the big spoon/ little spoon: Momo is very large and soft and Jirou likes to be held by her, Momo has strong arms for the purpose of hugging (well, for the purpose of carrying cannons around, but also for hugging.)

10. Their favorite nonsexual activity: I like to think that Present Mic maintains all his support gear himself and that he taught Jirou to do so too, and I definitely think Momo’s a maker-y kind of person so I can see them doing lots of tinkery-experiments on sound systems etc. Momo also really loves buying Jirou things.

When I'm not too busy being a kick ass mom I post about my healthy obsessions that are ♡ Tokyo Ghoul / Tokyo Ghoul: re ♡ Death Note ♡ Blue Exorcist ♡ Kuroshitsuji aka Black Butler ♡ One Punch Man ♡ My Hero Academia ♡ 
Yuri on Ice ♡ Among other fandoms.

summary: Bakugou : *singing* "Kiri, do you love me? Are you riding? Say you'll never ever leave from beside me. 'Cause I want you, and I...
body:
Bakugou : *singing* “Kiri, do you love me? Are you riding? Say you’ll never ever leave from beside me. ‘Cause I want you, and I need you, and I’m down for you always.”

Kaminari : Did you say Kiri instead of Kiki?

Bakugou : *completely possessed* SHUT UP YOU IDIOT! I SAID KIKI!!! ASSHOLE, I’LL KILL YOU YOU HEAR ME!?

Kaminari : *horrified* Okay Okay!!! I’m sorry… Shit man!

Kirishima : *watching the whole ordeal from a distance* He totally said Kiri.

reblog.comment:
Bakugou : *singing* “Kiri, do you love me? Are you riding? Say you’ll never ever leave from beside me. ‘Cause I want you, and I need you, and I’m down for you always.”

Kaminari : Did you say Kiri instead of Kiki?

Bakugou : *completely possessed* SHUT UP YOU IDIOT! I SAID KIKI!!! ASSHOLE, I’LL KILL YOU YOU HEAR ME!?

Kaminari : *horrified* Okay Okay!!! I’m sorry… Shit man!

Kirishima : *watching the whole ordeal from a distance* He totally said Kiri.

trail.content_raw:
Bakugou : *singing* “Kiri, do you love me? Are you riding? Say you’ll never ever leave from beside me. ‘Cause I want you, and I need you, and I’m down for you always.”

Kaminari : Did you say Kiri instead of Kiki?

Bakugou : *completely possessed* SHUT UP YOU IDIOT! I SAID KIKI!!! ASSHOLE, I’LL KILL YOU YOU HEAR ME!?

Kaminari : *horrified* Okay Okay!!! I’m sorry… Shit man!

Kirishima : *watching the whole ordeal from a distance* He totally said Kiri.
trail.content:
Bakugou : *singing* “Kiri, do you love me? Are you riding? Say you’ll never ever leave from beside me. ‘Cause I want you, and I need you, and I’m down for you always.”

Kaminari : Did you say Kiri instead of Kiki?

Bakugou : *completely possessed* SHUT UP YOU IDIOT! I SAID KIKI!!! ASSHOLE, I’LL KILL YOU YOU HEAR ME!?

Kaminari : *horrified* Okay Okay!!! I’m sorry… Shit man!

Kirishima : *watching the whole ordeal from a distance* He totally said Kiri.

blog.description: Digital Artist ~ Storyteller ~ Casual Weeb ~ I like to create characters & worlds, and paint in existential fantasy ✨

title: Shigaraki Tomura
body:
~*~

I’ve wanted to paint Shigaraki ever since I first saw his design. There is so much depth in his character when you look closer at what made him a “villain.”
And THAT is good character writing. <3 ^^


~ PRINTS available at sarahmillercreations.com!
& Look for more from Sarah Miller Creations on: 
ArtStation | Twitter | Instagram | facebook | deviantART | YouTube

blog.name: everyjirou
blog.title: Every Jirou
blog.description:
